info.name: Nightmare Night
info.description:
A style for the New Ponychan, created and maintained just for fun.
The stylesheet places the quick reply and all other content except for the threads themselves in a sidebar to the right. You can also pick among a couple pony mascots, which will be placed in said sidebar too.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2.1.1
Gives the option to show the post formatting helper

Supported browsers
Mozilla Firefox (12.0+)
Google Chrome (20.0+)

options.label: Luna
